00216                 const std::list<CFeature>* f_features_p) const
00217         {

00219             float l_white[1] = { 1.0f };
00220             float l_black[1] = { 0.0f };
00221             for (std::list<CFeature>::const_iterator
00222                     l_iter = f_features_p->begin();
00223                     l_iter != f_features_p->end(); l_iter++) {
00224                 l_img.draw_circle(l_iter->x, l_iter->y, l_iter->sigma + 1, l_black, 1.0f, 1);
00225                 l_img.draw_circle(l_iter->x, l_iter->y, l_iter->sigma    , l_white, 1.0f, 1);
00226                 l_img.draw_circle(l_iter->x, l_iter->y, l_iter->sigma - 1, l_black, 1.0f, 1);
00227             }
